tasks.description: Guests may come and go (especially after lunch), but the tables will always be there. Go around the room and count the number of tables where a guest may sit.

tasks.description: This wedding has like a 160 people (or something like that I can't remember). Some of them are very old (like you), some are very young (like a baby). But there is one guest who is younger than all the others. Find the youngest guest's name.
